text:
Hello Guys,
I want to know something regarding theme. we use theme in our product, but there is no performance  (speed as mobile device and desktop device ) in theme. ok,
can we increase performance  our theme,
here is the theme link which one I am using:<https://3109311.hs-sites.com/real-thor/listing-1>
only I want know that there is no sped in theme, how can we increase our website performance,

1. Optimise your google tag manager and delay things loading in such as hotjar 
2. Load jQuery from the footer
3. Add script tags to footer also defer or async them
4. optimise images better
5. Add lazyloading to images
There's 5 improvements you can do that I can see are missing
